attributes.action: Allow beauty salons and nail bars to reopen
attributes.additional_details: We want the government to change its decision and allow Beauty salons and nail bars across the UK to reopen. This is because people rely on these facilities to help with making them feel good and it massively helps with mental health and well being. Allowing pubs to re open where there is far more risk involved than in a salon where we have maximum hygiene procedures in place. Beauty Businesses will suffer if they do not open soon, many salons will not survive this if they are to stay closed
attributes.background: The goal is to get the government to rethink their decision to keep beauty salons and nail bars closed and to come to an agreement to reopen them. As many people rely on beauty and salon services as part of therapy or a source of happiness I think it would be beneficial for all to reopen them.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced that beauty salons are being allowed to reopen, and has published guidance for close contact services.

Read the announcement about the reopening of beauty salons here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/beauty-salons-set-to-reopen-for-some-services-next-week-under-new-government-guidelines

Read the Government's guidance on close contact services here: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/working-safely-during-coronavirus-covid-19/close-contact-services

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you find out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/

You may also be interested to know that because of the large number of petitions that have been started in relation to coronavirus, the Petitions Committee has been questioning the Government about its response to the coronavirus outbreak.
 
Find out more: https://committees.parliament.uk/work/192/the-governments-response-to-coronavirus/
